outline:
1. to seek, search out, spy out, explore
    1. (Qal)
      1. to seek out, select, find out how to do something
      2. to spy out, explore
        1. explorers, spies (participle)
      3. to go about
        1. merchant, trader (participle)
      4. (Hiphil) to make a search, make a reconnaissance
kjv_def: chap(-man), sent to descry, be excellent, merchant(-man), search (out), seek, (e-) spy (out).
strongs_def: to meander (causatively, guide) about, especially fortrade or reconnoitring
